name: 產業分析與競爭策略
description: This course aims at providing students a foundation for industry analysis and competitive strategy definition. Major emphasis will be placed on practical industry analysis and competitive strategy definition approaches, case studies through reports from leading market research institutes, experiences-sharing by analysts from leading companies or research institutes, as well as class projects which will be very useful for students willing to become analysts, marketers, fund managers as well as investors.
goals: 協助學生瞭解產業分析與競爭策略
syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction

Week 2:   Key issues in industry analysis

Week 3:   National industry analysis

Week 4: Market analysis and research

Week 5: Impacts of globalization on industry development

Week 6: The industry analysis process

Week 7: The strategic management process

Week 8: Stakeholders and the corporate mission

Week 9: External analysis: the identification of industry opportunities and threats

Week 10: Internal analysis: resources, capabilities, competencies, and competitive  advantage

Week 11: Building competitive advantage through functional-level strategy

Week 12: Business level strategy

Week 13: Competitive strategy and the industry environment

Week 14: Strategy in the global environment

Week 15: Corporate strategy – vertical integration, diversification, and strategic alliances

Week 16: Corporate development – building and restructuring the corporation

Week 17: Designing organizational structure

Week 18: Designing strategic control systems

Week 19: Managing structure and control to strategy

Week 20: Implementing strategic change
